mapper.select: select NO, TITLE, CONTENT, HIT, to_char(WDATE,'yyyy-mm-dd')WDATE, FILENAME, ID, ( select count(reno) from reply a, review b where a.no = b.no ) cnt from review order by no
mapper.insert: insert into review(no, title, content, fileName, grade, id, bno) values(REVIEW_SEQ.nextval,#{title},#{content},#{fileName},#{grade},#{id},#{bno})
